name: Deluxe Compass Bar Demo
description:
This demo shows the functionality available in the Deluxe Compass Bar.

Purchase from the Unity Asset Store

Fully compatible with Unity 5. 

A GUI and script package to include a compass and object tracking GUI to your game. Dynamically add/remove markers to easily and efficiently track any game object on your compass.

  • Dynamically add/remove Compass Markers to any game object
  • Automatically adjusts to any screen size
  • Completely customizable
  • Includes 6 skins and Photoshop templates for creating your own
  • Optional 3D icon overlays
  • Supports arbitrary magnetic north

If you have any questions about the asset or need support, please email support@whilefun.com.
